title: HPE security advisory (AV26-150)
description: On February 19, 2026, HPE published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE Telco Service Activator  versions prior to 10.5.0
HPE SimpliVity 380 servers  versions prior to SimpliVity Support Pack (SVTSP) Gen10 and Gen11
HPE Telco Service Orchestrator  versions prior to v5.5.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
